original_text: Peter therefore was kept in prison: but prayer was made without ceasing of the church unto God for him.
korean_text: 이에 베드로는 옥에 갇혔고 교회는 그를 위하여 간절히 하나님께 기도하더라

sentences.original_text: Peter therefore was kept in prison
but prayer was made without ceasing
of the church unto God for him
